const initState={themeId:1};export const themeReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;// fix any
switch(action.type){case"SET_THEME_ID":{return{...state,themeId:action.id};}default:return state;}};export const changeThemeId=id=>({type:'SET_THEME_ID',id});
